entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
